colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,(BSLAB PA YONGS SU SBYONG BA'I GZHI GSUM GYI CHO GA LA SOGS PA, SO SOR THAR PA'I BLANG DOR GYI GNAS RNAMS MDOR BSDUS PA 'DI NI, MKHYEN RAB GYI DBANG PHYUG SNYING DUS KYI RGYAL BA GNYIS PA MNGON MTHO DANG NGES LEGS KYI LAM GYI GNAD MTHA' DAG PAR THUGS SU CHUD NAS, SKAL BA DANG LDAN PA RNAMS LA TSUL BZHIN DU 'DOMS PA CHOS KYI RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYI PHYAG LEN LTAR, 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BA 'DIS, ,BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS TE YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,
